CustomField.description: BODEV-1134: Convert UG - Job Started Date (text in YYYY-MM format) to Date data type.
CustomField.formula:
/* UG - Job Started Date can be either YYYY-MM or YYYY format text. When YYYY format, it returns YYYY-01-01. Otherwise YYYY-MM-01. */
IF( ISBLANK( UserGems__UserGemsId__c ), NULL, DATE( VALUE( LEFT( UserGems__UserGemsId__c, 4) ), IF( LEN( UserGems__UserGemsId__c ) = 4, 1, VALUE( RIGHT( UserGems__UserGemsId__c, 2) ) ), 1 ) )
CustomField.label: UG - Current Job Start Date
